Articles.Content:
Hello mi new to the forums and i will really like a mod that adds parts form apollo 13 i will be really nice having apollo 13 happen on my craft all the way to the moon cause apollo 13 was one of my favorite mission and one of my favorite movies

 

i simply request a apollo 13 mod

 

please

43 minutes ago, Jim Lovell Kerman said:

Hello mi new to the forums and i will really like a mod that adds parts form apollo 13 i will be really nice having apollo 13 happen on my craft all the way to the moon cause apollo 13 was one of my favorite mission and one of my favorite movies

 

i simply request a apollo 13 mod

 

please

I don't know of any mods that specifically had apollo parts.  I'm pretty sure there was at one point a Saturn V mod but don't know if it has been kept up to date.

Have you google searched?

The making history expansion has parts inspired by the apollo program, but are not exact replicas.

Otherwise there are many tools and tutorials on modding and modeling.  Sounds like a perfect excuse to learn a new skill
The Saturn v mod doesn’t work to up to date ksp

The BDB mod (Bluedog Design Bureau) is one of the best mods for American spacecraft (plus it's well made, maintained, etc, etc)

 

However, it adds a lot of parts that might be overwhelming. It does have Apollo parts (plus some ETS variants!), but I'm not sure that there's anything Apollo-13 specific.
https://github.com/KSP-RO/FASA-RO/releases

41 minutes ago, Misguided Kerbal said:

The BDB mod (Bluedog Design Bureau) is one of the best mods for American spacecraft (plus it's well made, maintained, etc, etc)

However, it adds a lot of parts that might be overwhelming. It does have Apollo parts (plus some ETS variants!), but I'm not sure that there's anything Apollo-13 specific.

I'd also note that BDB's Saturn and Apollo parts are on the table to be redone right now; unfortunately real life has been keeping me busy so there hasn't been progress in a month or so. Won't be released for a while yet.

well i am doing an apollo 13 mission right now with fasa thanks for all of the comments and mods you guys suggested me

 

i am now going to the dark side of the moon...
